content.raw:
@{557058:6c52d6e5-77e0-41a8-8b6e-cb9462f4d5f1} as per your comments I have pulled out the duplicates into it’s own class.  Material color, scaling and height above water for the marker can now be specified using SDF. I have added documentation in the code for the SDF. The feature can now be turned off by removing the <markers> tag from the world file.

I didn’t create a new wiki page for this because I think the way I have restructured the code, it is pretty self documenting. That being said, if you still want me to create a wiki page I can do that.

Should be good to merge now
content.html:
@Brian Bingham as per your comments I have pulled out the duplicates into it’s own class. Material color, scaling and height above water for the marker can now be specified using SDF. I have added documentation in the code for the SDF. The feature can now be turned off by removing the <markers> tag from the world file.

I didn’t create a new wiki page for this because I think the way I have restructured the code, it is pretty self documenting. That being said, if you still want me to create a wiki page I can do that.

Should be good to merge now
